TopicTitle: Issue with subassemblies and struts and fuel lines in VAB

Articles.Content:
I connected a subassembly to my rocket and launched it, but when I reverted the flight to the VAB struts and fuel lines were not connected anymore. (The subassembly is from patch 0.25)

KSP: 0.90 Windows 32 bit

Mods installed: MechJeb 2.4.1.0

Log: https://www.dropbox.com/s/7lnr2wgt8uxmifr/output_log.txt?dl=0

Edited December 21, 2014 by redivh
I forgot to add that the subassembly is from patch 0.25
I was able to solve the problem after I remade the subassembly.
